metadata.title: CVE-2019-12467 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: MediaWiki through 1.32.1 has Incorrect Access Control (issue 1 of 3). Aspammer can use Special:ChangeEmail to send out spam with no rate limitingor ability to block them. Fixed in 1.32.2, 1.31.2, 1.30.2 and 1.27.6.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
